sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`REflex is a framework for vendor-agnostic software integration in the real estate industry.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"project-motivation"}}>{`Project Motivation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Data on the Web should not be locked in to particular systems or be only readable by the applications which created it.
Users should be free to switch between applications and share data between them.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"how-does-it-work"}}>{`How does it work?`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Applications generate notifications about activities, interactions, and new information, which may be presented to the user or processed further.
This allows for more modular systems, which decouple data storage from the applications which display or otherwise make use of the data.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Senders, receivers and consumers are independently implemented and run on different technology stacks,
and share a common message schema which is developed by the community and hosted on Github as open-source.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"features"}}>{`Features`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Maintain up-to-date data across a variety of systems in real-time`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Be aware of data changes as they happen`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Share data with other authorized parties`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`REflex leverages the latest in “pub/sub” event message bus technology`}<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`When data changes in one system, the owner of that system will “publish” a data change event to the REflex “message bus”. `}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Authorized parties are allowed to “subscribe” to the REflex message bus, so that they are notified about:`}<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`What data fields changed`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`How the data values changed`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`When the data was changed`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Who changed the data`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Other helpful metadata about the data event`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Examples:
- An Agent’s last name has changed in HSF’s CRM. Authorized vendors are notified of this event and can update their systems accordingly.
- A new customer lead has come through the website. Authorized vendors are notified of this event and can
make the lead available in their systems for the Agent to work with.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Constantly evolving features/functionality:`}<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`New types of vendors constantly added to the REflex ecosystem`}<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`For example, CRM vendors, Marketing vendors, transaction data vendors, etc`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`New data types constantly added to the REflex ecosystem`}<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`For example, Agent roster data, Customer lead data, etc`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`New security and data filtering/metadata capabilities constantly being evolved in the REflex ecosystem`}<MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`For example, establishing which vendors can access which types of data events from which sources`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
